title: 정형수
content:
정형수는 서울
공과대학
컴퓨터소프트웨어학부
교수이자
소프트웨어융합원
장이다.
위치:
ITBT관
405-2호
연락처: 02-2220-2399 / hyungsoo.jung@hanyang.ac.kr
연구실:
고확장 시스템 연구실
학력
Ph.D. in Computer Science, Seoul National University, AUG 2009.
M.S. in Computer Science, Seoul National University, FEB 2004.
B.S. in Mechanical Engineering, Korea University, FEB 2002.
경력
Associate Professor, Hanyang University, Seoul, South Korea, SEP 2018 ~ present
Assistant Professor, Hanyang University, Seoul, South Korea, SEP 2015 ~ AUG 2018
Sr. SDE, Amazon Aurora, AWS Inc., Seattle, USA, OCT 2012 ~ AUG 2015
Researcher, NICTA (now Data61), Sydney, Australia, APR 2012 ~ SEP 2012
Postdoctoral Researcher, The University of Sydney, Australia, APR 2010 ~ MAR 2012
